improvement_list.improvement_desc: The second loop starting on line 4 is unreachable because its condition is always false. The variable 'm' is always 7 and the loop iterates only if 'i' is in range(m), thus the condition 'i<7' which is always true will always lead to the inner loop that will never be executed.
The loop starting at line 10 has a similar issue. Due to the initialization of 'i' to 'm' and 'j' to 'n', the condition 'i > 0 and j > 0' will be false, making the block unreachable.
The print statement on line 20 will never be executed since the preceding loop is unreachable.
